# The `Bitfields.h` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file implements methods to test, set and extract typed bits from packed unsigned integers. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

<Link id="details" />


## Why not C++ bitfields?



C++ bitfields do not offer control over the bit layout nor consistent behavior when it comes to out of range values. For instance, the layout is implementation defined and adjacent bits may be packed together but are not required to. This is problematic when storage is sparse and data must be stored in a particular integer type.



The methods provided in this file ensure precise control over the layout/storage as well as protection against out of range values.



<Link id="details" />


## Usage example




<ProgramListing extension="cpp">

<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">uint8&#95;t Storage = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Store and retrieve a single bit as bool.</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a29dcc89db32a1eead61fe67cff38c060">Bool</a> = Bitfield::Element&lt;bool, 0, 1&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">Bitfield::set&lt;Bool&gt;(Storage, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">EXPECT&#95;EQ(Storage, 0b00000001);</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                          ^</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">EXPECT&#95;EQ(Bitfield::get&lt;Bool&gt;(Storage), </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Store and retrieve a 2 bit typed enum.</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: enum underlying type must be unsigned.</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">enum class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SuitEnum : uint8&#95;t &#123; CLUBS, DIAMONDS, HEARTS, SPADES &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: enum maximum value needs to be passed in as last parameter.</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight">Suit = Bitfield::Element&lt;SuitEnum, 1, 2, SuitEnum::SPADES&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">Bitfield::set&lt;Suit&gt;(Storage, SuitEnum::HEARTS);</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">EXPECT&#95;EQ(Storage, 0b00000101);</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                        ^^</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">EXPECT&#95;EQ(Bitfield::get&lt;Suit&gt;(Storage), SuitEnum::HEARTS);</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Store and retrieve a 5 bit value as unsigned.</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight">Value = Bitfield::Element&lt;unsigned, 3, 5&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">Bitfield::set&lt;Value&gt;(Storage, 10);</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">EXPECT&#95;EQ(Storage, 0b01010101);</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                   ^^^^^</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">EXPECT&#95;EQ(Bitfield::get&lt;Value&gt;(Storage), 10U);</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Interpret the same 5 bit value as signed.</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight">SignedValue = Bitfield::Element&lt;int, 3, 5&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">Bitfield::set&lt;SignedValue&gt;(Storage, -2);</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">EXPECT&#95;EQ(Storage, 0b11110101);</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                   ^^^^^</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">EXPECT&#95;EQ(Bitfield::get&lt;SignedValue&gt;(Storage), -2);</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ability to efficiently test if a field is non zero.</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">EXPECT&#95;TRUE(Bitfield::test&lt;Value&gt;(Storage));</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Alter Storage changes value.</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">Storage = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">EXPECT&#95;EQ(Bitfield::get&lt;Bool&gt;(Storage), </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">EXPECT&#95;EQ(Bitfield::get&lt;Suit&gt;(Storage), SuitEnum::CLUBS);</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">EXPECT&#95;EQ(Bitfield::get&lt;Value&gt;(Storage), 0U);</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">EXPECT&#95;EQ(Bitfield::get&lt;SignedValue&gt;(Storage), 0);</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">Storage = 255;</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">EXPECT&#95;EQ(Bitfield::get&lt;Bool&gt;(Storage), </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">EXPECT&#95;EQ(Bitfield::get&lt;Suit&gt;(Storage), SuitEnum::SPADES);</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">EXPECT&#95;EQ(Bitfield::get&lt;Value&gt;(Storage), 31U);</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">EXPECT&#95;EQ(Bitfield::get&lt;SignedValue&gt;(Storage), -1);</span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>

<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A struct defining useful bit patterns for n-bits integer types.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> T, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Bits&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns">BitPatterns</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Bit patterns are forged using the equivalent &#96;Unsigned&#96; type because of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// undefined operations over signed types (e.g. Bitwise shift operators).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Moreover same size casting from unsigned to signed is well defined but not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the other way around.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a256d10f001d8a689a25cf658d47e73e3"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a256d10f001d8a689a25cf658d47e73e3">Unsigned</a> = std::make&#95;unsigned&#95;t&lt;T&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;assert</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a256d10f001d8a689a25cf658d47e73e3">Unsigned</a>) == </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>), </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Types must have same size&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a900dad517a613bb0a1da85fb8dd55f6d"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a900dad517a613bb0a1da85fb8dd55f6d">TypeBits</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a256d10f001d8a689a25cf658d47e73e3">Unsigned</a>) &#42; CHAR&#95;BIT;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;assert</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a900dad517a613bb0a1da85fb8dd55f6d">TypeBits</a> &gt;= Bits, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;n-bit must fit in T&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// e.g. with TypeBits == 8 and Bits == 6</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#af422860447e221241107decfbe91bc0f"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a256d10f001d8a689a25cf658d47e73e3">Unsigned</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#af422860447e221241107decfbe91bc0f">AllZeros</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a256d10f001d8a689a25cf658d47e73e3">Unsigned</a>(0);                  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a3f3d4d91b7987dc71350acfa84e32b15"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a256d10f001d8a689a25cf658d47e73e3">Unsigned</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a3f3d4d91b7987dc71350acfa84e32b15">AllOnes</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a256d10f001d8a689a25cf658d47e73e3">~Unsigned</a>(0);                  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 11111111</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a8b1beef3861a9c4b13c1fe0fc0e5e6ce"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a256d10f001d8a689a25cf658d47e73e3">Unsigned</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a8b1beef3861a9c4b13c1fe0fc0e5e6ce">Umin</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#af422860447e221241107decfbe91bc0f">AllZeros</a>;                         </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#ad201bab28e409edb73a495dc1223f692"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a256d10f001d8a689a25cf658d47e73e3">Unsigned</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#ad201bab28e409edb73a495dc1223f692">Umax</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a3f3d4d91b7987dc71350acfa84e32b15">AllOnes</a> &gt;&gt; (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a900dad517a613bb0a1da85fb8dd55f6d">TypeBits</a> - Bits);     </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 111111</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#ac03fb7d13195746239d8386193354569"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a256d10f001d8a689a25cf658d47e73e3">Unsigned</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#ac03fb7d13195746239d8386193354569">SignBitMask</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a256d10f001d8a689a25cf658d47e73e3">Unsigned</a>(1) &lt;&lt; (Bits - 1); </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 100000</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a52f22fcfeb772edcd9194328b7709336"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a256d10f001d8a689a25cf658d47e73e3">Unsigned</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a52f22fcfeb772edcd9194328b7709336">Smax</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#ad201bab28e409edb73a495dc1223f692">Umax</a> &gt;&gt; 1U;                       </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 11111</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a825cb759b8b241d75306434b80b058af"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a256d10f001d8a689a25cf658d47e73e3">Unsigned</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a825cb759b8b241d75306434b80b058af">Smin</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a52f22fcfeb772edcd9194328b7709336">~Smax</a>;                            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 11100000</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a7c04cd4b16aa18377685d6adbcf3043c"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a256d10f001d8a689a25cf658d47e73e3">Unsigned</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a7c04cd4b16aa18377685d6adbcf3043c">SignExtend</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a256d10f001d8a689a25cf658d47e73e3">Unsigned</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a825cb759b8b241d75306434b80b058af">Smin</a> &lt;&lt; 1U);       </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 11000000</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#96;Compressor&#96; is used to manipulate the bits of a (possibly signed) integer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// type so it can be packed and unpacked into a &#96;bits&#96; sized integer,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#96;Compressor&#96; is specialized on signed-ness so no runtime cost is incurred.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The &#96;pack&#96; method also checks that the passed in &#96;UserValue&#96; is valid.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">template &lt;typename T, unsigned Bits, bool = std::is&#95;unsigned&lt;T&gt;::value&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/compressor"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/compressor">Compressor</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;assert</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(std::is&#95;unsigned&lt;T&gt;::value, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;T must be unsigned&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/compressor/#aa250caaebf754b022cdc9cc3473b3651"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/compressor/#aa250caaebf754b022cdc9cc3473b3651">BP</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns">BitPatterns&lt;T, Bits&gt;</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (StorageValue &gt;= <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#ac03fb7d13195746239d8386193354569">BP::SignBitMask</a>))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Impl is where Bifield description and Storage are put together to interact</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// with values.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/impl"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Bitfield, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StorageType&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/impl">Impl</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;assert</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(std::is&#95;unsigned&lt;StorageType&gt;::value,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">                </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Storage must be unsigned&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/impl/#ade04c491df24f9f2cd9428791ec8fa02"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/impl/#ade04c491df24f9f2cd9428791ec8fa02">IntegerType</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Bitfield::IntegerType;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/impl/#a523737220bd74cbfd78269dd6799f248"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/impl/#a523737220bd74cbfd78269dd6799f248">C</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/compressor">Compressor&lt;IntegerType, Bitfield::Bits&gt;</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/impl/#a236c4ed813b37d6d7935c15fb4198918"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/impl/#a236c4ed813b37d6d7935c15fb4198918">BP</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns">BitPatterns&lt;StorageType, Bitfield::Bits&gt;</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/impl/#a09ef2fa7a205bb1b5fe40f433f9fbd4d"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/impl/#a09ef2fa7a205bb1b5fe40f433f9fbd4d">StorageBits</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(StorageType) &#42; CHAR&#95;BIT;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;assert</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(Bitfield::FirstBit &lt;= <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/impl/#a09ef2fa7a205bb1b5fe40f433f9fbd4d">StorageBits</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Data must fit in mask&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;assert</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(Bitfield::LastBit &lt;= <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/impl/#a09ef2fa7a205bb1b5fe40f433f9fbd4d">StorageBits</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Data must fit in mask&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/impl/#ad4ab1ed7f6d3975d42cd0a9f7ddcf219"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StorageType <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/impl/#ad4ab1ed7f6d3975d42cd0a9f7ddcf219">Mask</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#ad201bab28e409edb73a495dc1223f692">BP::Umax</a> &lt;&lt; Bitfield::Shift;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Checks &#96;UserValue&#96; is within bounds and packs it between &#96;FirstBit&#96; and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#96;LastBit&#96; of &#96;Packed&#96; leaving the rest unchanged.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/impl/#a70396106a4515186e3aefe39af98cc9e"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/impl/#a70396106a4515186e3aefe39af98cc9e">update</a>(StorageType &amp;Packed, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/impl/#ade04c491df24f9f2cd9428791ec8fa02">IntegerType</a> UserValue) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StorageType StorageValue = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/compressor/#aca2cd0ceae369c29fdeba4e78783b6f3">C::pack</a>(UserValue, Bitfield::UserMaxValue);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Packed &amp;= <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/impl/#ad4ab1ed7f6d3975d42cd0a9f7ddcf219">~Mask</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Packed |= StorageValue &lt;&lt; Bitfield::Shift;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Interprets bits between &#96;FirstBit&#96; and &#96;LastBit&#96; of &#96;Packed&#96; as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// an&#96;IntegerType&#96;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/impl/#a1ebd6dc7953c014f87a95163874d0291"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/impl/#ade04c491df24f9f2cd9428791ec8fa02">IntegerType</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/impl/#a1ebd6dc7953c014f87a95163874d0291">extract</a>(StorageType Packed) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StorageType StorageValue = (Packed &amp; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/impl/#ad4ab1ed7f6d3975d42cd0a9f7ddcf219">Mask</a>) &gt;&gt; Bitfield::Shift;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/compressor/#ae31ff7880e8cf9d72bd53746d971bf06">C::unpack</a>(StorageValue);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Interprets bits between &#96;FirstBit&#96; and &#96;LastBit&#96; of &#96;Packed&#96; as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// an&#96;IntegerType&#96;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/impl/#a9035aebdbd8127174cc3dca7514a09bd"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StorageType <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/impl/#a9035aebdbd8127174cc3dca7514a09bd">test</a>(StorageType Packed) &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Packed &amp; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/impl/#ad4ab1ed7f6d3975d42cd0a9f7ddcf219">Mask</a>; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#96;Bitfield&#96; deals with the following type:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - unsigned enums</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - signed and unsigned integer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - &#96;bool&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Internally though we only manipulate integer with well defined and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// consistent semantics, this excludes typed enums and &#96;bool&#96; that are replaced</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// with their unsigned counterparts. The correct type is restored in the public</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// API.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">template &lt;typename T, bool = std::is&#95;enum&lt;T&gt;::value&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/resolveunderlyingtype"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/resolveunderlyingtype">ResolveUnderlyingType</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/resolveunderlyingtype/#a4c2aa122f10ecb5f1315d106a43da9aa"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/resolveunderlyingtype/#a4c2aa122f10ecb5f1315d106a43da9aa">type</a> = std::underlying&#95;type&#95;t&lt;T&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/resolveunderlyingtype-1894ccc07fdcdbf1d7beb00bbf18f805"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> T&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/resolveunderlyingtype">ResolveUnderlyingType</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/false">false</a>&gt; &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// In case sizeof(bool) != 1, replace &#96;void&#96; by an additionnal</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/resolveunderlyingtype-f0800806bb2b027d53758f20ee230aed/#a9e3d6636015fece369aa0c6a57754fd3"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/resolveunderlyingtype-f0800806bb2b027d53758f20ee230aed/#a9e3d6636015fece369aa0c6a57754fd3">type</a> = std::conditional&#95;t&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(bool) == 1, uint8&#95;t, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&gt;;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Holds functions to get, set or test bitfields.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfield"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfield">Bitfield</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Describes an element of a Bitfield. This type is then used with the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Bitfield static member functions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\tparam T         The type of the field once in unpacked form.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\tparam Offset    The position of the first bit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\tparam Size      The size of the field.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\tparam MaxValue  For enums the maximum enum allowed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> MaxValue = std::is&#95;enum&lt;T&gt;::value</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             ? <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>(0) </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// coupled with static&#95;assert below</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             : std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;T&gt;::max()&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfield/element"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfield/element">Element</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfield/element/#a673ac9e8625e085763fb772610b83182"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfield/element/#a673ac9e8625e085763fb772610b83182">IntegerType</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/resolveunderlyingtype/#a4c2aa122f10ecb5f1315d106a43da9aa">bitfields&#95;details::ResolveUnderlyingType&lt;T&gt;::type</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfield/element/#a232de8cc034a792e04c52ceb543e613a"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfield/element/#a232de8cc034a792e04c52ceb543e613a">Shift</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfield/element/#a867cea04e8d6d91e565125fc78087b4a"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfield/element/#a867cea04e8d6d91e565125fc78087b4a">FirstBit</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfield/element/#af2ec084a2cf0d295f0df8ea15e4cfea7"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfield/element/#af2ec084a2cf0d295f0df8ea15e4cfea7">LastBit</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfield/element/#a232de8cc034a792e04c52ceb543e613a">Shift</a> + <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfield/element/#a37325735aef69cd7556de3b835767d55">Bits</a> - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfield/element/#ac97bc0b40f8f7b458e734291ef255f93"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfield/element/#ac97bc0b40f8f7b458e734291ef255f93">NextBit</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfield/element/#a232de8cc034a792e04c52ceb543e613a">Shift</a> + <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfield/element/#a37325735aef69cd7556de3b835767d55">Bits</a>;</span></CodeLine>
